recipeDescription: Classic Italian pasta dish with rich meat sauce.
recipeIngredients:
400g spaghetti
200g ground beef
1 onion, diced
2 cloves garlic, minced
400g canned tomatoes
2 tbsp tomato paste
1 tsp dried oregano
Salt and pepper to taste
recipeInstructions:
1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
2. In a pan, brown ground beef with onions and garlic.
3. Add tomatoes, tomato paste, oregano, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 15 minutes.
4. Serve sauce over cooked spaghetti.

recipeDescription: Quick and healthy stir-fried chicken with vegetables.
recipeIngredients:
500g boneless chicken, sliced
1 bell pepper, sliced
1 cup broccoli florets
2 carrots, julienned
3 tbsp soy sauce
1 tbsp sesame oil
2 cloves garlic, minced
recipeInstructions:
1. Heat sesame oil in a wok and sauté garlic.
2. Add chicken and cook until browned.
3. Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender.
4. Pour soy sauce and toss everything together.

recipeDescription: Homemade pizza with fresh vegetables and cheese.
recipeIngredients:
1 pizza dough
1/2 cup tomato sauce
1 bell pepper, sliced
1 red onion, thinly sliced
1 cup mushrooms, sliced
1 cup mozzarella cheese, shredded
1 tbsp olive oil
recipeInstructions:
1. Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C).
2. Roll out pizza dough and spread tomato sauce.
3. Arrange vegetables and sprinkle with cheese.
4. Drizzle with olive oil and bake for 15-20 minutes.

recipeDescription: Moist and delicious banana bread recipe.
recipeIngredients:
3 ripe bananas, mashed
1/2 cup butter, melted
1 tsp vanilla extract
1 cup sugar
2 cups all-purpose flour
1 tsp baking soda
1/2 tsp salt
recipeInstructions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Mix mashed bananas, melted butter, and vanilla extract.
3. In a separate bowl, combine sugar, flour, baking soda, and salt.
4. Combine wet and dry ingredients, pour into a greased loaf pan, and bake for 60 minutes.

recipeDescription: Refreshing salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, and feta cheese.
recipeIngredients:
2 tomatoes, diced
1 cucumber, sliced
1 red onion, thinly sliced
200g feta cheese, crumbled
Kalamata olives
3 tbsp olive oil
1 tbsp red wine vinegar
1 tsp dried oregano
recipeInstructions:
1. Combine tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, feta cheese, and olives in a bowl.
2. In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, red wine vinegar, and oregano.
3. Pour dressing over the salad and toss gently before serving.
